entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
